description.short: Don't expect anything fancy. This fictional example hotel has the bare minimum content, rate availability and features you can expect from any hotel on the Impala platform (https://impala.travel). It contains minimum photography at the minimum resolution, only the fields that you can expect to see on every hotel on the platform, and only one room type and rate. Testing with this hotel means your app works well in the rare cases where a hotel has only minimum content available.

address.countryName: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

roomTypes.name: Standard Room
roomTypes.description: A fictional room you can in your testing. It contains only the bare minimum content you can expect for any room type on the Impala platform, with the smallest resolution images for any room type on our platform (https://impala.travel). Making sure your app works well and displays this room type properly means you're ready for the rare cases where only minimal content is available for a room type.

data.name: Impala All-Inclusive Always Available Resort (Example Hotel) [SANDBOX]

description.short: This fictional example hotel allows you to experience all the content, rates and features the Impala platform (https://impala.travel) has to offer. Testing with this hotel allows you to experience the full breadth of functionality and rate options hotels might offer on Impala – and to ensure your app displays everything correctly.
